text: The Associated Press is an independent global news organization dedicated to factual reporting. Founded in 1846, AP today remains the most trusted source of fast, accurate, unbiased news in all formats and the essential provider of the technology and services vital to the news business. title: Jada Pinkett Smith calls Tupac biopic ‘deeply hurtful’

og.title: Jada Pinkett Smith calls Tupac biopic 'deeply hurtful'
og.description: Jada Pinkett Smith is calling the Tupac Shakur biopic "All Eyez on Me" "deeply hurtful" for its portrayal of her relationship with the rap legend.
